actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Committee on Agriculture. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Agriculture. Reported to Senate by Senator Leahy with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 36.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill to provide for fair treatment for farmers and ranchers who are participating in the Persian Gulf War as active reservists or in any other military capacity, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides with regard to activated reservists participating in the Persian Gulf War for: (1) acreage base protection; (2) waiver of minimum rice or upland cotton planting requirements; (3) waiver of certain conservation requirements; and (4) farm credit assistance (borrower relief and loan modifications). Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to provide for procedures by which a spouse or other close relative of an activated reservist could make farm program decisions.

titles.title: A bill to provide for fair treatment for farmers and ranchers who are participating in the Persian Gulf War as active reservists or in any other military capacity, and for other purposes.
